items.title: Too Legit to Quit: 5 SFF Books I Hope To Read Before 2026
items.description: There's not much time to wrap up your reading years. What are the sci-fi and fantasy books you hope to get to before 2026?

items.title: 8 Holiday Romance Books to Snuggle Up with This Winter
items.description: Pick up these winter holiday romances, from fake dating for Hanukkah to a very pleasant Christmas haunting to a New Year's Eve fling.

items.title: The Best Book Club Books of 2025
items.description: Here are the best book club books of 2025, from the most popular picks this year to under-the-radar picks that deserve more attention.

items.title: The Best New Book Releases Out the Rest of December
items.description: Get ready for a dark academia romantic fantasy, a love letter to reading, a queer story of friendship set in a fictional African country, and more.
